name: preprints_create
description:
Creates a new preprint.
#### Returns
Returns a JSON object with a `data` key containing the representation of the created preprint, if the request is successful.

If the request is unsuccessful, an `errors` key containing information about the failure will be returned. Refer to the [list of error codes]() to understand why this request may have failed.

attributes.description: The properties of the preprint entity.

date_created.description: The time at which the preprint was created, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.

date_modified.description: The time at which the preprint was last modified, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.

date_published.description: The time at which the preprint was published, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.

doi.description: The DOI of the associated journal article, as entered by the user, if the preprint is published.

is_preprint_orphan.description: Whether or not the preprint is orphaned. A preprint can be orphaned if it's primary file was removed from the preprint node. This field may be deprecated in future versions.

license_record.description: The metadata (copyright year and holder) associated with a license, required for certain licenses.

subjects.description: A nested array structure that describe subjects related to the preprint, in the BePress taxonomy. Each dictionary contains the text and ID of a subject.

attributes.title: Attributes

id.description: The identifier of the preprint entity.

links.description: URLs to alternative representations of the preprint entity.

doi.description: The URL representation of the DOI entered by the user for the preprint manuscript.

html.description: A link to the project on the OSF that was created for the preprint, or from which the preprint was created.

preprint_doi.description: The URL representation of the OSF assigned DOI for the preprint.

self.description: A link to the detail page for the preprint.

links.title: Links

relationships.description: URLs to other entities or entity collections that have a relationship to the preprint entity.

bibliographic_contributors.description: A relationship to the bibliographic contributors that are listed as contributing to this preprint.

citation.description: A relationship to the citation of the preprint.

identifiers.description: A relationship to the identifiers associated with the preprint.

license.description: A relationship to the license that has been applied to the preprint.

node.description: A relationship to the node that was created for the preprint, or from which the preprint was created.

primary_file.description: A relationship to the file that is designated as the preprint's primary file, or the manuscript of the preprint.

provider.description: A relationship to the preprint provider under which the preprint was created (OSF, socarxiv, psyarxiv, etc.).

relationships.title: Relationships

type.description: The type identifier of the preprint entity (`preprints`).
